#labels free,cms,freecms,freeteam,开源,免费,内容管理系统,channelList
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">根据参数提取栏目对象列表。</span></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse: collapse">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<p>
					<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">参数</span></b></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">说明</span></b></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">id</span></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">栏目<span>id</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">siteid</span></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">栏目所属站点<span>id</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">parid</span></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">空字符<span>:</span>查询所有栏目<span>;</span></span></p>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">&quot;par&quot;:</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">查询一级栏目<span>;</span></span></p>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">&quot;parid&quot;:</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">查询此<span>id</span>下栏目<span>;</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<table border="1" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="border-collapse: collapse">
	<tbody>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<p>
					<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">返回值</span></b></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">说明</span></b></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
		<tr>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">channel</span></p>
			</td>
			<td>
				<p>
					<span style="font-family: 宋体">栏目对象，类型为数据对象<span>channel</span></span></p>
			</td>
		</tr>
	</tbody>
</table>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">示例<span>1</span></span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">根据站点<span>id</span>提取所有栏目。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">&lt;@channelList siteid=&quot;${site.id}&quot; parid=&quot;&quot; ;channel&gt; </span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;H1 &gt;${channel.name}&lt;/H1&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">&lt;<a rel="nofollow"><font color="#4466bb">/@channelList</font></a>&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<b><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/190011_A0Hy_916014.jpg" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/190011_A0Hy_916014.jpg" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></b></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">示例</span></b><b><span>2</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">根据站点<span>id</span>提取所有一级栏目。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">&lt;@channelList siteid=&quot;${site.id}&quot; parid=&quot;par&quot; ;channel&gt; </span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;H1 &gt;${channel.name}&lt;/H1&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">&lt;<a rel="nofollow"><font color="#4466bb">/@channelList</font></a>&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/190101_Wq9N_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/190101_Wq9N_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">示例</span></b><b><span>3</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">根据站点<span>id</span>和<span>parid</span>提取指定栏目的下级栏目。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">&lt;@channelList siteid=&quot;${site.id}&quot; parid=&quot;c60bebab-cf84-4ba9-8c79-3dff5c2dc427&quot; ;channel&gt; </span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;H1 &gt;${channel.name}&lt;/H1&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">&lt;<a rel="nofollow"><font color="#4466bb">/@channelList</font></a>&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/190137_g37l_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/190137_g37l_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">示例</span></b><b><span>4</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">根据站点<span>id</span>和<span>parid</span>递归提取栏目。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">&lt;@channelList siteid=&quot;${site.id}&quot; parid=&quot;par&quot; ;channel&gt; </span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;H1 &gt;${channel.name}&lt;/H1&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;UL&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;@channelList siteid=&quot;${site.id}&quot; parid=&quot;${channel.id}&quot; ;sonChannel&gt; </span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;LI&gt;&lt;A href=&quot;${sonChannel.pageurl}&quot;&gt;${sonChannel.name}&lt;/A&gt; </span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;/@channelList&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span>&lt;/UL&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">&lt;/@channelList&gt;</span></p>
<p>
	&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	&nbsp;<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/190158_zP8D_916014.png" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1230/190158_zP8D_916014.png" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
